draw_light_enable: This function is used to enable a defined light. When you define a positional or a directional light you must assign it an index number which is then used by this function to switch the light on or off. Default is disabled (<tt>false</tt>).
NOTE: There are only 8 hardware lights available, so only 8 defined lights can be enabled at any one time (although more can be defined).
The index number of the light (from 0 to 7)
Enable or disable all lighting (<tt>true</tt> or false)
The above code will enable lighting for the whole scene, then define a white directional light in the room space, and then finally turn that light on.
